analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#462-471):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#464-465)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#468-470)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#482-492):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#485)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#488-489)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#490-492)

Reentrancy in SimpleLSTDistribution.withdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#798-838):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > SimpleTGEContract.publicTGEEndBlockTimeStamp().add(SimpleTGEContract.TRSOffset())) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#800-801)
	- require(bool)(SimplePreTGEContract.allocationsLocked()) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#803-804)
	- (_publicTGEHasVested,_publicTGEWeiContributed) = SimpleTGEContract.contributions(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#808-809)
	- (_preTGEHasVested,_preTGEWeiContributed) = SimplePreTGEContract.contributions(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#810-813)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocations (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#817)
	- allocations (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#817-818)

	- allocations (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#830-833)

Reentrancy in SimpleLSTDistribution.withdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#798-838):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > SimpleTGEContract.publicTGEEndBlockTimeStamp().add(SimpleTGEContract.TRSOffset())) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#800-801)
	- require(bool)(SimplePreTGEContract.allocationsLocked()) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#803-804)
	- (_publicTGEHasVested,_publicTGEWeiContributed) = SimpleTGEContract.contributions(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#808-809)
	- (_preTGEHasVested,_preTGEWeiContributed) = SimplePreTGEContract.contributions(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#810-813)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- vesting (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol)

SimpleTGE.SimpleTGE (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#618-638) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_publicTGEStartBlockTimeStamp >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#625)

SimpleTGE.vest (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#680-699) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > publicTGEEndBlockTimeStamp (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#689-697)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= publicTGEStartBlockTimeStamp) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#683-685)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp.sub(publicTGEEndBlockTimeStamp) <= TRSOffset) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#694-697)

SimpleLSTDistribution.SimpleLSTDistribution (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#772-793) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_vestingStartTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#787)

SimpleLSTDistribution.withdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#798-838) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > SimpleTGEContract.publicTGEEndBlockTimeStamp().add(SimpleTGEContract.TRSOffset())) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc25a27281e10f140a97ea5f845c0de1bf8782f90.sol#800-801)
